text: Hulaŋ 5.12 HJL 2.43, 4.32, 14.3, Lom 15.18-19, 2 Ko 12.12 Jisasɨ lɨbɨmɨŋami agɨlaŋ mu sihɨ mu sihɨ agɨladɨ abalamavɨhadami. Abalamavɨdaci hulaŋ iamɨgali agɨlaŋ iga iga abavɨhadami. Amɨŋ ala uavɨhadami. Lɨhavɨdaci hulaŋ iamɨgali avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavɨmi agɨlaŋ nɨbɨlaŋ sɨkasɨkan hɨji humɨgaŋ pam hɨnihɨni Asɨ dɨ aŋam ulaŋ hekɨlɨ caba heŋ uavɨhadami. Uu ulaŋ matalɨŋ heŋ mɨgudɨbavɨhadami. Ulaŋ matalɨŋ agadɨ ibi Solomon dɨ ulaŋ matalɨŋ uavɨhadami.
